phases.name: Phase 1 – Hardware Foundations & Modern Embedded C++
phases.description: Calibrate hardware lab, sharpen modern C++ for microcontrollers, and build disciplined debugging habits. End goal: confidently shipping bring-up firmware on STM32 and ESP32 targets.

hours.title: C Variables and Data Types
hours.ai_prompt: Learn int, char, float, arrays, and memory sizes

hours.title: Control Flow: Loops
hours.ai_prompt: Master for, while, do-while with break/continue

hours.title: Functions and Prototypes
hours.ai_prompt: Write functions with parameters and return values

hours.title: Pointer Arithmetic
hours.ai_prompt: Navigate arrays and memory using pointer math

hours.title: Voltage Fundamentals
hours.ai_prompt: Understand voltage as electrical potential difference

hours.title: Kirchhoff Voltage Law
hours.ai_prompt: Apply KVL to analyze series circuits

hours.title: Voltage Measurement
hours.ai_prompt: Use multimeter for accurate voltage readings

hours.title: Resistor Networks
hours.ai_prompt: Analyze series, parallel, and mixed networks

hours.title: Power Ratings
hours.ai_prompt: Select resistors based on power dissipation

hours.title: Linux Command Line Basics
hours.ai_prompt: Navigate filesystem with cd, ls, pwd

hours.title: File Operations
hours.ai_prompt: Use cp, mv, rm, cat, and redirections

hours.title: Text Processing
hours.ai_prompt: Apply grep, sed, awk for text manipulation

hours.title: Bitwise Operations
hours.ai_prompt: Apply AND, OR, XOR, NOT, shifts

phases.name: Phase 2 – Real-Time Systems & Connected Firmware
phases.description: Deepen RTOS mastery, tackle open RISC-V/ESP32-C3 bring-up, design resilient connectivity stacks, and harden security for fleet-ready firmware. Culminates in a production-quality Zephyr/FreeRTOS application spanning CAN, Ethernet, BLE, and secure provisioning.
